articles.description: Captioning images of the momentous occasion, mther-of-four Coleen wrote on Thursday: 'Special night..... congratulations Kai. I love you and I am so proud of you. Keep trying your best ❤️'.
articles.content:
Coleen Rooney has proudly revealed that her eldest son Kai has joined Manchester United's academy, following in his dad Wayne's footsteps at the team.
